<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bulletin boards and other displays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschlagbretter und anderes Bildschirmanzeigen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableaux d'affichage et autre affichages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placas e outras de boletim indicadores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bordi ed altro del bollettino 
visualizzazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίνακες δελτίων και άλλες παρουσιάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tablones y otro de anuncios visualizaciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using your bulletin boards as a teaching tool -- not just as decoration.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihre Anschlagbretter als unterrichtendes 
Hilfsmittel -- nicht gerade als Dekoration verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant vos tableaux d'affichage comme outil 
d'enseignement -- pas simplement comme décoration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando suas placas de boletim como uma ferramenta 
ensinando -- não apenas como a decoração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando i vostri bordi del bollettino come 
strumento d'istruzione -- non appena come decorazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τους πίνακες δελτίων σας ως εργαλείο 
διδασκαλίας -- όχι ακριβώς όπως τη διακόσμηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando sus tablones de anuncios como herramienta 
de enseñanza -- no apenas como decoración.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

VERSION:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
